Description: Password reset functionality completely broken. Users cannot reset forgotten passwords. SMTP connection failing.

1. Navigate to /forgot-password

Description: Avatar upload rejects files at exactly 10MB (boundary). Max is supposed to be 10MB inclusive.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to account
2. Go to /profile/edit
3. Upload avatar_10mb.jpg (exactly 10,485,760 bytes)
4. Click Upload
Expected Result: Upload succeeds. 10MB is within maximum limit.
Actual Result: Upload rejected with error: File too large. Max is 10MB but 10MB files are rejected.
column13: Validation check uses < instead of <=. Fix: max_size_bytes <= 10485760

Summary: SQL injection possible in search field
Description: User search field vulnerable to SQL injection. Attacker can execute arbitrary SQL.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to user search
2. Enter: '; DROP TABLE users; --
3. Click Search
4. Check database
Expected Result: Input sanitized. No SQL executed. Safe error or no results.
Actual Result: SQL query executed directly. Potential database manipulation. Security breach.
column13: Raw SQL concatenation instead of parameterized queries. File: backend/app/api/v1/search.py Line 142

Description: Profile bio field allows JavaScript execution. XSS vulnerability present.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Edit profile
2. Set bio to: <script>alert('XSS')</script>
3. Save profile
4. View profile page
Expected Result: Script not executed. HTML escaped and displayed as plain text.
Actual Result: JavaScript executes when profile is viewed. Alert popup appears. XSS vulnerability confirmed.
column13: HTML not being escaped. Need to sanitize user input before rendering.

Summary: Rate limiting not working on login
Description: Users can attempt unlimited login tries. Brute force attack possible.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Attempt login with wrong password\n2. Try 20 times rapidly\n3. Observe behavior
Expected Result: After 5 failed attempts account locked for 15 minutes. Rate limiting active.
Actual Result: No rate limiting enforced. All 20 attempts processed. No lockout occurs.
column13: SlowAPI rate limiter not applied to login endpoint. Missing @limiter.limit decorator.

Description: JWT access tokens not expiring after 30 minutes as configured. Sessions last indefinitely.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login successfully
2. Wait 35 minutes without activity
3. Try to access protected endpoint
4. Observe if still authenticated
Expected Result: Session expired after 30 minutes. User must login again.
Actual Result: Session still active after 60+ minutes. JWT not expiring correctly.

Description: Navigation menu breaks on mobile devices. Hamburger icon not functional.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open site on mobile (375px width)\n2. Try to open navigation menu\n3. Observe behavior
Expected Result: Hamburger menu appears. Clicking opens slide-out nav. All links accessible.
Actual Result: Menu items overlap. Hamburger icon visible but not clickable. Navigation broken.

Description: Registration allows mismatched passwords. No client-side validation.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to registration
2. Password: Pass1234
3. Confirm: Pass5678 (different)
4. Click Register
Expected Result: Error shown: Passwords do not match. Form not submitted.
Actual Result: Form submitted despite mismatch. Backend validation catches it but UX is poor.
column13: Missing password confirmation check in frontend validation. Add to form validator.

Summary: Avatar not deleted when user deletes account
Description: User account deletion does not remove uploaded avatar file. Data leak.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. User with avatar uploaded
2. Delete account
3. Confirm deletion
4. Check uploads folder
Expected Result: User data completely removed. Avatar file deleted from storage.

Summary: Email already exists returns 500 instead of 400
Description: Duplicate email registration returns wrong HTTP status code. Should be 400 not 500.

Expected Result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with message: Email already registered
Actual Result: HTTP 500 Internal Server Error. Confusing error message.

Description: Skills autocomplete suggests skills that were soft-deleted from database.

Expected Result: Only active skills shown. Deleted skills not suggested.

Description: Frontend cannot call auth endpoints on production. CORS policy blocking requests.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Login from frontend (megilance.site)\n2. API call to api.megilance.site/api/auth/login\n3. Check browser console
Expected Result: Request succeeds. CORS headers allow cross-origin request from frontend domain.
Actual Result: CORS error: Origin megilance.site not allowed. Request blocked by browser.
column13: CORS_ORIGINS env var missing production frontend URL. Add to .env file.

Summary: Profile page crashes with null avatar

Expected Result: Default avatar displayed. No errors. Page renders correctly.

Description: Some pages show MM/DD/YYYY others show DD/MM/YYYY. Confusing for users.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Check registration timestamp on dashboard\n2. Check profile created_at on profile page\n3. Compare date formats

Actual Result: Dashboard: 02/15/2024. Profile: 15/02/2024. Different formats.
column13: No centralized date formatting utility. Create formatDate() helper function.

Description: Unread notification count doesn't update in real-time. Requires page refresh.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. User receives new notification\n2. Check notification bell icon\n3. Observe count
Expected Result: Badge updates immediately via WebSocket. Shows correct unread count.
Actual Result: Badge shows old count. Only updates after manual page refresh.
column13: WebSocket not emitting notification_count_update event. Add to notification service.

Description: User search returns all results at once. No pagination. Slow for large datasets.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Search for users\n2. Observe 500+ results loading\n3. Check page performance
Expected Result: Results paginated (20 per page). Load time < 1 second. Pagination controls visible.
Actual Result: All 500+ results loaded at once. Page load time 5+ seconds. Browser freezes briefly.
